mapper.select: SELECT "EKA"."LST_BANK_PUSAT"."LSBP_ID" AS bank_id, "EKA"."LST_BANK_PUSAT"."LSBP_NAMA" AS bank_nama, "EKA"."LST_BANK_PUSAT"."LSBP_PANJANG_REKENING" AS max_digit FROM EKA.LST_BANK_PUSAT WHERE "EKA"."LST_BANK_PUSAT"."LSBP_ID" = #{lsbp_id} and flag_aktif = 1 ORDER BY "EKA"."LST_BANK_PUSAT"."LSBP_NAMA" ASC

select * from eka.mst_kartu_pas where product_code = '73' and product_sub_code = '14' and produk = 16 and reg_spaj is null and flag_active = 0 and no_va is not null and premi = #{premi} and rownum = 1 order by no_kartu asc FOR UPDATE
SELECT EKA.MST_COUNTER.MSCO_VALUE FROM EKA.MST_COUNTER WHERE EKA.MST_COUNTER.MSCO_NUMBER = #{number} AND EKA.MST_COUNTER.LCA_ID = #{lca_id} FOR UPDATE
SELECT msco_month_year FROM eka.mst_counter a WHERE a.msco_number = #{aplikasi} AND a.lca_id = #{cabang} FOR UPDATE
